channel.title: Anyone try to sequence their axo synth with a Korg sq-1?
channel.description: cant seem to get it working

item.title: Anyone try to sequence their axo synth with a Korg sq-1?
item.dc:creator: @clln collin
item.description:
@clln wrote:

yes i read through that awhile back. i was just attempting to send midi notes out to the axo. was surprised when nothing happened lol

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone try to sequence their axo synth with a Korg sq-1?

item.title: Anyone try to sequence their axo synth with a Korg sq-1?
item.dc:creator: @sevo Sevo Stille
item.description:
@sevo wrote:

The modes of the SQ-1 are a bit of a mess, it supports old Korg CV/Trig/Clock standards as well as the Roland/Moog ones Korg adopted in recent years without a clear separation - i.e. part by mode switches, part by selecting the right outputs. Have you read the FAQ? http://www.korg.com/us/products/dj/sq_1/faq_tips.php

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone try to sequence their axo synth with a Korg sq-1?
